input: The input "https://example.com free giveaway" suggests an online promotion. Specifically, it points to a Uniform Resource Locator (URL), `https://example.com`, which is a placeholder domain name often...

perspectives.text: This is a textbook example of how predatory schemes use the allure of 'free' to exploit vulnerable individuals online.
